data.comment: Today's referee, Jorge Perez, has blown to start the match.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 3, Jose Macias for Guadalajara drives towards goal at Estadio Caliente. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 7, Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 10, Luis Leal (Tijuana de Caliente) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Jesus Angulo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Guadalajara.
In the minute 13, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tijuana.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Guadalajara drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In the minute 23, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Guadalajara's Uriel Antuna breaks free at Estadio Caliente. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Jorge Perez awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente close to the penalty box.
Free kick in a good position for Tijuana de Caliente!
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 36, Tijuana de Caliente's Fabian Castillo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Caliente. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Free kick Guadalajara.
Fabian Castillo (Tijuana de Caliente) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 40, In Tijuana, Alexis Vega of Guadalajara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
In the minute 42, Guadalajara needs to be cautious. Tijuana de Caliente have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 45, Jorge Perez awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Caliente.
Jorge Perez has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tijuana.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 53, Guadalajara have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Tijuana Tijuana de Caliente drive forward through Luis Leal. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
The home team have replaced Edgar Lopez with Bryan Angulo. This is the first substitution made today by Pablo Guede.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
Jorge Perez signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
In the minute 62, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 64, Guadalajara drive upfield and Isaac Brizuela gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tijuana de Caliente defender.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
In Tijuana, Uriel Antuna (Guadalajara) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 68, Free kick Tijuana de Caliente.
The away team replace Jesus Angulo with Fernando Beltran.
Victor Vucetich is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Caliente with Dieter Villalpando replacing Jose Macias.
Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 72, In Tijuana, Hiram Mier (Guadalajara) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 74, Guadalajara's Hiram Mier is back in action after a slight knock.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Hiram Mier for Guadalajara who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jordan Silva is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Jordan Silva is back on the pitch.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente close to the penalty box.
David Barbona is replacing Luis Leal for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
Clifford Aboagye is on a sub for Fabian Castillo for Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Guadalajara.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in high up the field for Tijuana de Caliente in Tijuana.
In the minute 87, Kevin Balanta for Tijuana de Caliente drives towards goal at Estadio Caliente. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a third substitution, with Angel Zaldivar replacing Uriel Antuna.
The away team have replaced Alexis Vega with Oribe Peralta. This is the fourth substitution made today by Victor Vucetich.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Guadalajara make their fifth substitution with Miguel Ponce replacing Cristian Calderon.
In the minute 89, Kevin Balanta gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tijuana de Caliente.
Can Tijuana de Caliente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guadalajara's half?
Jorge Perez signals a throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente, close to Guadalajara's area.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Tijuana.
Guadalajara have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
That's full-time at Estadio Caliente. The final score is 0-0.
